celebrations.title: Beginning of the Blessed Coptic New Year (Feast of El-Nayrouz).
Martyrdom of St. Bartholomew the Apostle.
Departure of St. Avilius, the 3rd Pope of Alexandria.
Martyrdom of St. John the Baptist.
Martyrdom of St. Dasya the Soldier.
Assembly of the Holy Synod at Alexandria under St. Dionysius, the 14th Pope of Alexandria, in 243 AD.
Great Earthquake in Cairo and Most of the Egyptian Cities in the year 1112 AD.
Departure of St. Verena.
Departure of St. Macarius II, the 69th Pope of Alexandria
Martyrdom of St. Sophia
Departure of Isaiah, the Prophet.
Martyrdom of St. Basilissa
Departure of St. Dioscorus, the 25th Pope of Alexandria.
Departure of St. Severian, bishop of Gabala in Syria
Martyrdom of St. Rebecca and her children Saints Agathon, Peter, John, Amun, & Amuna
Departure of Moses, the Prophet.
Martyrdom of Zacharias, the Prophet.
Martyrdom of St. Diomedes (Dimides).
Martyrdom of St. Pisora, Bishop of Masil
Miracle of Colossae in Phrygia
Martyrdom of St. Matruna
Commemoration of St. Basin and her Children
Martyrdom of St. Basilides (Wasilides) the Minister.
Commemoration of Cornelius the Centurion.
Departure of St. Theodora.
Commemoration of Michael, the Archangel.
Assembly of the 3rd Ecumenical Council at Ephesus in the year 431 AD.
Translocation of the relics of St. Clemus (Aklimos) & his companions
Departure of Pope Matthew II, the 90th Pope of Alexandria.
Commemoration of the Miracle performed by St.Basil the Great,Bishop Caesarea, Cappadocia.
Departure of St. Agathon the Stylite
Translocation of the Body of St. Stephen, the Archdeacon.
Commemoration of St. Leontius of Syria
Consecration of the Church of the Resurrection (Holy Sepulchre)
Translocation of the relics of St. John Chrysostom.
Departure of Hegumen Yakoub Saleeb Al-Masoodi
Appearance of the Holy Cross
Departure of St. Theognosta
Second day of the Holy Cross Feast
Martyrdom of St. Porphyrius (Prophorius)
Martyrdom of St. Stephen the Priest & St. Niceta (Niketa)
Third day of the Holy Cross Feast
Commemoration of St. Gregory the Illuminator, Patriarch of Armenia.
Departure of St. Athanasius II, the 28th Pope of Alexandria
Departure of St. Theopista
Martyrdom of St. Melitina the Virgin
Commemoration of the Holy Virgin St. Mary, the Mother of God (Theotokos)
Martyrdom of St. Cyprian & St. Justina.
Martyrdom of Saints Cotylas (Kobtlas), his sister Axoua, and his friend Tatas
Martyrdom of St. Julius of Aqfahs (El-Akfehasi), the Writer of the Biography of Martyrs
Martyrdom of St. Eunapios (Onanius) & St. Andrew
Martyrdom of St. Thecla.
Reopening of the Church of the Holy Virgin in the Haret al-Rum (Cairo).
Departure of St. Gregory the Ascetic
Martyrdom of St. Quadratus, one of the Seventy Disciples.
Departure of Jonah, the Prophet.
Martyrdom of St. Maurice, Commander of the Theban Legion.
Angel's Annunciation to Zechariah the Priest of the birth of St. John the Baptist
Martyrdom of St. Eustathius and his two Sons
Martyrdom of St. Eustathius and his two Sons
Martyrdom of St. Apater (Abadir) and his sister Saint Herai (Eraee)
Martyrdom of St. Rhipsime (Arbsima) the Virgin, St. Gaiana, and her Sisters the Virgins
Commemoration of the Miracle that God performed for St. Athanasius the Apostolic.
